## apiBase

[src/\_helpers/Auth/authApiBase.js:9-9][14]

Auth base interceptor for axios.
Implements additional incerceptors from lib specific on subfolder.

Returns **axios** instance

## AuthProvider

[src/\_helpers/Auth/authContext.js:11-38][15]

Exposes context for Auth base. Also implements lib specifics from subfolder

### Parameters

*   `$0` **[Object][16]** 

    *   `$0.children`  

## i18n

[src/\_helpers/i18n.js:5-5][17]

i18next implementation for locale translations
This demo uses self domain as backend translation provider, however you could use local files directly or use authApiBase for authorized requests.

## RoleInfoProvider

[src/\_helpers/roleInfoContext.js:12-32][18]

Exposes context for roleInfo

### Parameters

*   `$0` **[Object][16]** 

    *   `$0.children`  

## StoreProvider

[src/\_helpers/storeContext.js:11-22][19]

Exposes context for store. A very simple dataObject state hook.
Please consider the use of proper state manager.

### Parameters

*   `$0` **[Object][16]** 

    *   `$0.children`  

## UserInfoProvider

[src/\_helpers/userInfoContext.js:12-32][20]

Exposes context for userInfo

### Parameters

*   `$0` **[Object][16]** 

    *   `$0.children`  

## window.log

[src/App.js:15-15][21]

DevUtils - console.log utility, window.debug variable dependant, implemented on app.js as window.log

## ShouldRender

[src/common/ShouldRender.js:15-41][22]

Renders child if isTrue equals TRUE, otherwise renders self FallbackDefault component or node passed at fallback param.
Optional can use timeoutSec to render self TimeoutFallbackDefault component or node passed at timeoutFallback param after certain seconds if isTrue is not satisfied.

### Parameters

*   `props`
